nodes.text: Oriss Khan was a soldier in the Rebel Alliance who served during the Galactic Civil War. Having training at the rebel base on the moon Yavin 4, Khan worked at a kitchen with fellow trainees Marinna Reynolds and Chase Wilsorr, teaching the latter about different foods from the soldier's homeworld. Khan eventually completed training on Yavin 4 and was training with the Rebel Alliance Special Forces and doing sentry duty by the time of the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY.
Oriss Khan was mentioned in the short story "A Good Kiss," written by C.B. Lee as a part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
